pr_title: Add config parameter for deactivating auto-registered listeners

timeline.message:
#2181, Add conditional property to be able to deactivate listeners being registered from ServiceLoader
Update conditions deactivate to support csv parameters

timeline.author: marcphilipp

replies.bodyText:
Wanted to circumnavigate using an Optional as a method parameter along with trying to remove the dependency on Configuration parameter.
Using Optional as method parameters (or class members) isn't really ideal since they take only delegate a state of the variable while exposing a deceiving NPE potential on themselves.
Do you suggest any other way?
replies.author: nishantvas

replies.bodyText: Can we just take a String and handle the Optional on the outside? If that ends up being too much duplication, I think Optional<String> would be better here and we don't have a general rule in this project (even though IntelliJ might disagree) against Optional as method parameter. A Supplier can be null, too. 😉
replies.author: marcphilipp

timeline.bodyText: ❌ These two constants should be moved to junit-jupiter-engine and junit-platform-launcher, respectively.

replies.bodyText: In a dot separated class naming, wouldn't semi-colon be helpful for readability?
replies.author: nishantvas

replies.bodyText: I think we should instead allow whitespace, i.e. trim each pattern.
replies.author: marcphilipp

timeline.bodyText: ❌ Please add tests for comma-separated patterns to ExecutionConditionTests.

replies.bodyText:
This seems to update the list itself and can only be used once after which it'll filter the list leaving it blank

Filter the iterable under test keeping only elements matching the given {@link Predicate}.
replies.author: nishantvas

replies.bodyText: That Javadoc is misleading, it does not modify the supplied list.
replies.author: marcphilipp

timeline.bodyText: ⭕️ I think we should write a unit test for this class now. It should probably have existed earlier. 😉

timeline.message: Add Unittests for ClassNameFilterUtil, documentations, more review comments
Merge branches '#2181' and 'master' of https://github.com/nishantvas/junit5 into #2181

timeline.bodyText: Sorry, this is probably a matter of taste but I'd rather see you reverting this formatting change.
timeline.author: marcphilipp

replies.bodyText:
Revert to keeping the formatter off to methods? Or remove from tests altogether?
I'm perfectly fine with either
replies.author: nishantvas

replies.bodyText: Yes, please keep it's scope smaller. It should not extend beyond a method body.
replies.author: marcphilipp

timeline.bodyText: I'd rather use @ValueSource(strings = {}) for these tests.
timeline.author: marcphilipp

replies.bodyText: Not sure why I didn't think of that.
replies.author: nishantvas
